# Discord Chat Analysis: ðŸ’»â”‚developers

## 1. Summary
The discussion primarily focused on Hyperfy development with significant updates to the platform. Ash introduced several new features including player physics push/force mechanics, undo functionality for world editing, and UI improvements. A major development was the conceptualization of "Elemental" (formerly "Lootify"), a modular framework for inventory, combat, and item systems. Developers discussed UI positioning challenges, emoji support in props, and various app implementations. The community explored Twitter/X API integration for displaying tweets in-world, with discussions about authentication challenges. Several developers shared their projects including a butterfly swarm animation and UI components for health bars and inventories. There were technical discussions about handling player stats, health systems, and the trade-offs between core functionality versus app-based implementations. The chat also touched on potential trading systems between players, including on-chain transactions with Hyper tokens and centralized item trading mechanisms.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Is there a way to make imported GLB bigger like we used to be able to do in V1? (asked by fractilians) A: Only via script currently, but it's a one-liner: `app.scale.setScalar(10)` (answered by Ashxn)
Q: How do we find our avatar position in world? (asked by MetaRick) A: `const player = world.getPlayer(); player.position` will give the world position of the local player (answered by Ashxn)
Q: Why does it duplicate my rock instead of picking it up? (asked by ToxSam) A: Unanswered
Q: Can I use uiimage on the onscreen UI? (asked by Omka) A: Yes, it should be 100% the same as in-world UI (answered by Ashxn)
Q: Is there a way to make them move like the ones in Dream Light Valley? (asked by Ashxn) A: Unanswered
Q: How hard is it to get the lower body blending for emotes like in V1? (asked by peezy) A: V1 had a base locomotion emote with custom emotes on top; if your emote doesn't have leg bones, it'll play walk/run anims with custom emote for top half (answered by Ashxn)
Q: Is there a way to rotate UI views to be more at cardinal directions? (asked by Omka) A: Not currently; everything is drawn inside a canvas for world-space and VR compatibility (answered by Ashxn)
Q: Is there a way to get the dimensions of a GLB programmatically in JavaScript? (asked by peezy) A: Load GLTF into ThreeJS and then get bounding box; this is used to get avatar height (answered by Ashxn)
